problemDescription: Solve this problem to combine the items to make the gems of enlargement
description: This is a magical room. Everything is floating including you.  Yet you can move around the room just by thinking about going in a direction. If you have the small vial, the small shiny pebble, and magic stuff you can make a gem of enlargement by solving a problem if not you must go back and find the objects.  There is only one path out of here and that is to the east.
